namespace.description: Identifier for the file. It must be unique and must be different from the vanilla namespaces.

type.title: Type of the element. It's required to have it otherwise it will throw an error.

orientation.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Stack Panel```	
	
Direction the items stack inside ```stack_panel```.	
	
***Requires***: ```***type***: stack_panel```	
***Default***: ```vertical```

enabled.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Any```	
	
The element and all its children will use the locked state if they have it.	
	
***Default***: ```true```

size.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Any```	
	
Size of the element. __[width, height]__	
 ___px___ - *Pixels*	
 ___%___ - *Width/height of parent element*	
 ___%c___ - *Width/height of children*	
 ___%cm___ - *Width/height of the largest child element*	
 ___%sm___ - *Width/height of sibling element*	
 ___%x___ - *Width of the element*	
 ___%y___ - *Height of the element*	
 ___c%___ - *Width/height of children. Works on: 0.16 only*	
	
***Default***: ```[default, default]```

max_size.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Any```	
	
Maximum size of the element. __[width, height]__	
 ___px___ - *Pixels*	
 ___%___ - *Width/height of parent element*	
 ___%c___ - *Width/height of children*	
 ___%cm___ - *Width/height of the largest child element*	
 ___%sm___ - *Width/height of sibling element*	
 ___%x___ - *Width of the element*	
 ___%y___ - *Height of the element*	
 ___c%___ - *Width/height of children. Works on: 0.16 only*	
	
***Default***: ```[default, default]```

min_size.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Any```	
	
Minimum size of the element. __[width, height]__	
 ___px___ - *Pixels*	
 ___%___ - *Width/height of parent element*	
 ___%c___ - *Width/height of children*	
 ___%cm___ - *Width/height of the largest child element*	
 ___%sm___ - *Width/height of sibling element*	
 ___%x___ - *Width of the element*	
 ___%y___ - *Height of the element*	
 ___c%___ - *Width/height of children. Works on: 0.16 only*	
	
***Default***: ```[default, default]```

offset.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Any```	
	
Offset of the element relative to the parent element. __[x, y]__	
 ___px___ - *Pixels*	
 ___%___ - *Width/height of parent element*	
 ___%x___ - *Width of the element*	
 ___%y___ - *Height of the element*	
	
***Default***: ```[0, 0]```

anchor_from.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Any```	
	
Start position origin relative to parent element.	
	
***Default***: ```center```

anchor_to.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Any```	
	
End position origin relative to parent element.	
	
***Default***: ```center```

locked_alpha.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Image | Label```	
	
Alpha/transparency of the element when ```enabled: false```.	
	
***Default***: ```1.0```

clips_children.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Any```	
	
Cuts off everything beyond the bounderies of the element.	
	
***Default***: ```false```

color.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Label | Image```	
	
Tint color. __[r, g, b] (0 <= v <= 1)__	
	
***Default***: ```white```

locked_color.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Label | Image```	
	
Tint color when ```enabled: false```. __[r, g, b] (0 <= v <= 1)__	
	
***Default***: ```white```

texture.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Image```	
	
Image path starting from pack root.

nineslice_size.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Image```	
	
9-slice. __[x1, y1, x2, y2]__ __[x1/x2, y1/y2]__ or just a number for all of them.

grayscale.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Image```	
	
Turn image to black and white.	
	
***Default***: ```false```

always_handle_pointer.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Input Types```	
	
Always handle pointer even if it goes outside of the element.	
	
***Default***: ```false```

renderer.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Custom```	
	
Special elements that are created in minecraft source code because they are too complex for json ui.	
	
***Warning***: Be aware that some of them will only work on specific screens.

bindings.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Any```	
	
Binds special or hardcoded values to the element which can also affect how the element interacts with other elements.

close_on_player_hurt.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Screen```	
	
If the screen should close when the player gets hurt.	
	
***Default***: ```false```

draggable.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Scrollbar``` Box	
	
Orientation of the scrollbar thumb.

focus_change_up.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Input Types```	
	
Focus identifier of the element where the focus goes when it leaves the element from above. If ```FOCUS_OVERRIDE_STOP``` is used the focus will not be able to escape from above the element.

focus_change_down.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Input Types```	
	
Focus identifier of the element where the focus goes when it leaves the element from below. If ```FOCUS_OVERRIDE_STOP``` is used the focus will not be able to escape from below the element.

focus_change_left.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Input Types```	
	
Focus identifier of the element where the focus goes when it leaves the element from the left side. If ```FOCUS_OVERRIDE_STOP``` is used the focus will not be able to escape from the left side of the element.

focus_change_right.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Input Types```	
	
Focus identifier of the element where the focus goes when it leaves the element from the right side. If ```FOCUS_OVERRIDE_STOP``` is used the focus will not be able to escape from the right side of the element.

allow_clipping.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Any```	
	
Allows ```clips_children``` to work on the element. Otherwise, it won't have any effect.	
	
***Default***: ```true```

selected.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Edit Box```	
	
Text box is selected by default.	
	
***Default***: ```false```

can_be_deselected.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Edit Box```	
	
Text box can be deselected.	
	
***Default***: ```true```

radio_toggle_group.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Toggle```	
	
If toggle belongs to a group. Each toggle of the group must have a different ```toggle_group_forced_index```.	
	
***Default***: ```false```

prevent_touch_input.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Input Panel```	
	
Prevents touch events from firing.	
	
***Default***: ```false```	
***Version***: ```+1.10```

scrollbar_track_button.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Scroll View```	
	
Button id for the track button action.

scrollbar_touch_button.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Scroll View```	
	
Button id for the touch action.

jump_to_bottom_on_update.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Scroll View```	
	
Jump to the bottom when the scrolling panel has an update. For example, adds more children to it.	
	
***Default***: ```false```

scrollbar_track.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Scroll View```	
	
Name of child or nested child element that will behave as track.

scrollbar_box.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Scroll View```	
	
Name of child or nested child element that will behave as scrollbar thumb.

scroll_content.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Scroll View```	
	
Name of child or nested child element that will behave as the content root parent.

scroll_view_port.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Scroll View```	
	
Name of child or nested child element that will behave as the view port.

scroll_box_and_track_panel.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Scroll View```	
	
Name of child or nested child element that will contain the scrollbox and track elements.

toggle_name.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Toggle```	
	
Different names, don't affect each other toggle indexes, etc. Some toggle names are hardcoded but you can have your owns.

toggle_default_state.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Toggle```	
	
If the toggle is the one active from a group by default.	
	
***Default***: ```false```

toggle_grid_collection_name.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Toggle```	
	
Name of the hardcoded collection to be used. It can be empty.	
	
***Warning***: Be aware that some of them will only work on specific screens.

slider_box_control.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Slider```	
	
Name of the child or nested child element that will behave as the slider thumb.

slider_small_decrease_button.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Slider```	
	
Button id for the decrease slider action.	
	
***Version***: ```+1.2```

slider_small_increase_button.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Slider```	
	
Button id for the increase slider action.	
	
***Version***: ```+1.2```

slider_selected_button.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Slider```	
	
Button id for the select slider action.	
	
***Version***: ```+1.2```

slider_deselected_button.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Slider```	
	
Button id for the deselect slider action.	
	
***Version***: ```+1.2```

background_control.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Slider```	
	
Name of the child or nested child that will behave as the slider background.	
	
***Info***: It's not needed if you just want a static background.	
***Version***: +1.2

background_hover_control.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Slider```	
	
Name of the child or nested child that will behave as the slider background on hover.	
	
***Info***: It's not needed if you just want a static background.	
***Version***: +1.2

progress_control.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Slider```	
	
Name of the child or nested child that will behave as the slider background overlay for the progress part.	
	
***Info***: It's not needed if you just want a static background.	
***Version***: +1.2

progress_hover_control.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Slider```	
	
Name of the child or nested child that will behave as the slider background overlay for the progress part on hover.	
	
***Info***: It's not needed if you just want a static background.	
***Version***: +1.2

text_box_name.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Edit box```	
	
Different names, don't affect each others content. The names are hardcoded.

text_edit_box_grid_collection_name.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Edit box```	
	
Name of the hardcoded collection to be used. It can be empty.	
	
***Warning***: Be aware that some of them will only work on specific screens.

clip_direction.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Image```	
	
Side from where the clip happens. If ```down```, the image will begin to appear from the bottom.

clip_pixelperfect.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Image```	
	
If the clip should try to be most pixel accurate possible.	
	
***Default***: ```true```

enabled_newline.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Edit Box```	
	
Allows text box to be multiline.	
	
***Default***: ```false```

toggle_on_button.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Toggle```	
	
Button id for the toggle on action.	
	
***Version***: ```+1.2```

toggle_off_button.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Toggle```	
	
Button id for the toggle off action.	
	
***Version***: ```+1.2```

grid_position.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Grid```	
	
A grid is made up of columns and rows. ```grid_position``` specifies what is the location of the element inside the grid. [0, 2] would be column = 1 and row = 3. __[column, row]__

grid_dimensions.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Grid```	
	
Number of columns and rows the grid has. __[columns, rows]__

anim_type.markdownDescription: Anim(ation) type is independent of ui element types.

from_button_id.description: Button id that fires the event.

to_button_id.description: Button id executed when event is fired.

consume_event.description: If false, it will not be focused.

default_control.description:
***Type***: Toggle
Name of the child element that will show up when button is on it's default state.

hover_control.description:
***Type***: Toggle
Name of the child element that will show up when button is being hovered.

locked_control.description:
***Type***: Toggle
Name of the child element that will show up when button is disabled/locked.

pressed_control.description:
***Type***: Toggle
Name of the child element that will show up when toggle is on the "pressed" state.

frame_step.markdownDescription:
***Anim Type***: ```Flip Book```	
	
How many frames does the animation has.

text_type.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Edit Box```	
	
Which characters are allow in the text box.

slider_steps.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Slider```	
	
How many steps (or values) does the slider have.

slider_collection_name.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Slider```	
	
Name of the hardcoded collection to be used. Be aware that some of them will only work on some screens.

indent_control.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Slider Box```	
	
Name of the child element that will show up when slider box is on the __indent__ state.

checked_control.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Toggle```	
	
Name of the child element that will show up when toggle is on the __checked__ state.

unchecked_control.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Toggle```	
	
Name of the child element that will show up when toggle is on the __unchecked__ state.

checked_hover_control.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Toggle```	
	
Name of the child element that will show up when toggle is on the __checked_hover__ state.

unchecked_hover_control.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Toggle```	
	
Name of the child element that will show up when toggle is on the __unchecked_hover__ state.

checked_locked_control.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Toggle```	
	
Name of the child element that will show up when toggle is on the __checked_locked__ state.

unchecked_locked_control.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Toggle```	
	
Name of the child element that will show up when toggle is on the __unchecked_locked__ state.

checked_locked_hover_control.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Toggle```	
	
Name of the child element that will show up when toggle is on the __checked_locked_hover__ state.

unchecked_locked_hover_control.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Toggle```	
	
Name of the child element that will show up when toggle is on the __unchecked_locked_hover__ state.

requires.description: Required condition to this changes to happen.
Required condition to this changes to happen.

text_tts.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Label```	
	
Text content for text to speech.	
	
***Version***: ```+1.15/1.16```

notify_on_ellipses.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Label```	
	
Array of names of elements to notify when text gets or loses ellipses.	
	
***Version***: ```+1.3/1.4```

tts_name.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Input Types```	
	
Main text for text to speech.	
	
***Version***: ```+1.11```

tts_control_header.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Input Types```	
	
Text for text to speech.	
	
***Version***: ```+1.11```

tts_inherit_siblings.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Input Types```	
	
Element has siblings that use text to speech and inherits their tts.	
	
***Default***: ```false```	
	
***Version***: ```+1.11```

tts_index_priority.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Input Types```	
	
Element text to speech priority.	
	
***Version***: ```+1.15/1.16```

tts_skip_message.markdownDescription:
***Type***: Input Types	
	
Doesn't allow text to speech and skip it.	
	
Default: false	
Version: +1.15/1.16

tts_ignore_count.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Input Types```	
	
Ignore how many elements are in queue for tts.	
	
***Version***: ```+1.15/1.16```

ttsSectionContainer.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Input Types```	
	
The content belongs to a certain tts.	
	
***Version***: ```+1.15/1.16```

tts_section_header.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Input Types```	
	
Text to speech for the tts section.	
	
***Version***: ```+1.11```

tab_index.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Tab (Legacy type)```.	
	
Index of the tab. It must be unique.	
	
***Version***: ```0.16 - 1.0```

tab_content.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Tab (Legacy type)```.	
	
Name of the element that shows up when tab is selected	
	
***Version***: ```0.16 - 1.0```

keep_ratio.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Image```	
	
Keep ratio when resizing image with __size__.	
	
***Version***: ```+1.12```

propagate_alpha.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Any```	
Only images and labels can use the alpha property. So if you use it in a panel, for example, it won't do anything. However, if __propagate_alpha__ is enabled, all children and nested children of the element that allow the __alpha__ property will it have it set to the element alpha value.	
	
***Default***: ```false```	
***Version***: ```+1.1```

force_render_below.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Screen```	
	
Render previous screen on the screen stack below.	
	
***Default***: ```false```	
	
***Version***: ```+1.0```

bilinear.markdownDescription:
***Type***: ```Image```	
	
Use the bilinear function when resizing the image.	
	
***Default***: ```false```	
***Version***: ```+1.5```

markdownEnumDescriptions: Just a wheel. Nothing to see here.
Unlike "panel", "stack_panel" stacks the elements vertically or horizontally.
Like "panel" but it receives input from the user.
Allows to insert custom hardcoded elements.

binding_type.description: Which bind type will be used.

source_control_name.description: Name of the nested child element to observe so to be able to extract its properties values.

ignored.description:
If binding is completely ignored.
Default: false
Version: +1.17

source_property_name.markdownDescription:
Store the value of the property named of the element refered in ```source_control_name```.	
	
***Requires***: ```source_control_name```

target_property_name.markdownDescription:
The element property that the stored value in ```source_property_name``` will be applied to.	
	
***Requires***: ```source_property_name``` and ```source_control_name```

binding_name.description: Stores the value of the hardcoded bind name or condition with it.

binding_condition.description: Condition for the binding to happen.

binding_name_override.markdownDescription:
Name of the element property that will apply the stored value in ```binding_name```.	
	
***Warning***: Be aware that some of them will only work on some screens.	
***Requires***: ```binding_name```

binding_collection_name.markdownDescription:
Name of the hardcoded collection to be used.	
	
***Warning***: Be aware that some of them will only work on some screens.
